programme.desc: AMISTAD is about a 1839 mutiny onboard a slave ship that is traveling towards the Northeast Coast of America. Much of the story involves a court-room drama about the slave who led the revolt.

programme.title: Days of Thunder, (1990, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: Discovered by businessman Tim Daland, Cole is teamed with legendary crew chief and car-builder Harry Hogge to race for the Winston Cup at the Daytona 500. A crash nearly ends Cole’s career and he must turn to a beautiful doctor to regain his nerve.

programme.title: Thunderheart, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: Val Kilmer, Sam Shepard and Graham Greene star in this murder mystery filled with style and suspense. Kilmer stars as Ray Levoi, a hotshot FBI agent who's thrust into a strange new world when he is sent to solve a murder on an Indian reservation.

programme.title: Kiss the Girls, (1997, Thriller)
programme.desc: Eight kidnapped women. All beautiful. All talented. All in danger of having their lives cut cruelly short if police detective Alex Cross and key witness Kate McTiernan can’t locate the elusive “collector” who calls himself Casanova.

programme.title: Titanic, (1997, Romance)
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio and Oscar-nominee Kate Winslet light up the screen as Jack and Rose, the young lovers who find one another on the maiden voyage of the "unsinkable" R.M.S. Titanic.

programme.title: Bad News Bears In Breaking Training, (1977, Comedy)
programme.desc: The story picks up the Bears career a year after their infamous second-place finish in the North Valley League. Faced with a chance to play the Houston Toros for a shot at the Japanese champs, they devise a way to get Texas to play at the famed Astrodome.

programme.title: Bad News Bears Go To Japan, (1978, Comedy)
programme.desc: Caught in a clash of cultures and ready to wreak more havoc on Japan than Godzilla, the Bad News Bears are back this time the Bears are spirited off to Tokyo by a slick and sleazy con artist who sees in the team a perfect peg for a get-rich-quick scheme.

programme.title: Gator, (1976, Action)
programme.desc: The Feds want Gator McKlusky (Burt Reynolds) to go undercover to expose a local crime boss and former boyhood pal, Bama McCall. When Gator discovers Bama is involved in extortion, prostitution, and murder, the suspense builds to an explosive climax!

programme.title: The Bad News Bears, (1976, Comedy)
programme.desc: A major surprise as one of 1976's top-grossing films. THE BAD NEWS BEARS is a movie about children that is refreshing, utterly believable, and quite cleverly funny.

programme.title: Bad News Bears In Breaking Training, (1977, Comedy)
programme.desc: The story picks up the Bears career a year after their infamous second-place finish in the North Valley League. Faced with a chance to play the Houston Toros for a shot at the Japanese champs, they devise a way to get Texas to play at the famed Astrodome.

programme.title: Bad News Bears Go To Japan, (1978, Comedy)
programme.desc: Caught in a clash of cultures and ready to wreak more havoc on Japan than Godzilla, the Bad News Bears are back this time the Bears are spirited off to Tokyo by a slick and sleazy con artist who sees in the team a perfect peg for a get-rich-quick scheme.

programme.title: The Harder They Come, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: Reggae legend Jimmy Cliff stars as Ivan Martin, an aspiring singer hoping to make a name for himself. Robbed of his money and possessions, he finds work with a self-righteous preacher

programme.title: Coffy, (1973, Action)
programme.desc: Pam Grier stars as Coffy, a one-woman vigilante force, out to even the score with those who have hooked her sister on drugs. Coffy uses her sex appeal and an assortment of weapons to rid the streets of society's scum in this cult classic.

programme.title: Foxy Brown, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: A blaxploitation film about a woman whose drug-dealing brother ratted on her undercover narcotics-agent boyfriend to the mob and she, in turn, poses as a call girl to infiltrate the mobsters who butchered him.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With the potent powers of Claw of Hermos, Joey transforms Time Wizard into an almighty... hammer? Can Joey master the uncanny abilities of his new card to pound Mai's Harpie Ladies before they slash him to shreds?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Professor Hawkins has discovered startling connections between the world's conundrums, the Orichalcos stones and an ancient lost civilization.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a Wild West showdown between Yugi and his fiercest challenge yet: Rafael and his guardian monsters.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi calls on the legendary strength of Timaeus, but when it's not enough to crack Rafael's defense, will Yugi resort to desperate measures and go against everything he believes in to make the riskiest move of his life?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Using the abilities of Seal of Orichalcos, Yugi grinds Rafael's guardians, but he's also succumbing to the card's evil influence. As darkness grows within his heart, the consequences of his non-heroic acts may be his undoing.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz has captured Yugi's soul! Broken and unmotivated, how will our heroes ever rescue Yugi, especially when Dartz has a duo of nefarious new recruits ready to eradicate them?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: A cross-country expedition turns tragic when Dartz's new duelists separate Yugi from Joey in order to capture their souls separately.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Nothing will stop Weevil and Rex Raptor from quenching their thirst for revenge by capturing Yugi and Joey's souls!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Having lost the trust of Timaeus, Yugi can no longer use his guardian dragon against Weevil's insect invasion. Discouraged and confused, Yugi has lost his dueling instincts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is on a vision quest where he must travel through a past of evil to find and conquer his greatest foe... himself.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is in no shape to duel... but Dartz doesn't care! Dartz sends out his ancient annihilator Orichalcos Soldier to finish Yugi once and for all.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Valon is ready to take on the world and fight... for the heart of Mai? And the first adversaries standing in his way are Duke and Rebecca!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a duel thirty thousand feet in the air as Alister squares off against Kaiba on top of an airplane.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Alister dispatches his airborne arsenal Air Fortress Ziggurat! How can Kaiba defeat a monster the size of the plane itself?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz has taken over KaibaCorp! Can Kaiba, with Yugi's help, break into his own company which he's protected with the latest in security technology?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With chaos running rampant, Valon separates Joey from his friends for a final showdown with Mai's heart on the line.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Decked out in high-tech body armor and weapons, Valon pummels Joey with punishing punches. Can Joey outthink the computer before it's too late?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Decked out in high-tech body armor and weapons, Valon pummels Joey with punishing punches. Can Joey outthink the computer before it's too late?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey and Valon's battle rages to its climax as Joey attempts to turn the duel around by augmenting the same armor that Valon used against him.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Broken and battered after his exhausting battle against Valon, Joey can barely stand up, much less duel. However, he faces a fresh and determined Mai.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a rematch between the Pharaoh and Rafael - but this time, the Pharaoh doesn't have Yugi to protect him.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rafael appears to be creating an opening for the Pharaoh's counterattack, but Rafael has even more dreadful displays of terror in mind.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rafael calls forth Guardian Dreadscythe, a ravaging reaper that can never be defeated.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After discovering the location of Dartz's secret base, our heroes are on their way to stop Dartz once and for all. Can they reach Dartz before he resurrects the lethal Grand Dragon Leviathan from its millennial slumber?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz's secrets are finally revealed! As the answers to the most puzzling questions are exposed, the Pharaoh and Kaiba realize how much is at stake.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz plants the souls of our captured heroes into Mirror Knights to use them as puppets to fight the Pharaoh and Kaiba.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz summons the thundering Orichalcos Shunoros to pound the Pharaoh and Kaiba into pancakes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's soul has been captured, leaving the Pharaoh all alone to fend for himself against the invincible forces of Dartz and the Orichalcos! Will his friends reach out from the beyond to give him one last fighting chance?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gateway opens for the final endgame as the world-devourer Grand Dragon Leviathan and the legendary Atlantis rise out of its watery grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: All the monsters of Earth join forces with the survivors of the monster domain for an epic showdown against Grand Dragon Leviathan!
programme.sub-title: Rise of the Great Beast, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grand Dragon Leviathan's thunderous roars unleash hundred-foot tall waves worldwide! How can Yugi stop the annihilation of the planet?
programme.sub-title: Rise of the Great Beast, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the gang have saved the world from Dartz and his Grand Dragon Leviathan, but they're about to face their biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is trapped inside the Duel Dome, and the only way to escape is by defeating the Duel Computer, programmed with the skills of the world's top duelists. Since the Duel Computer has access to thousands of cards, how can Yugi win?

programme.title: An unlikely source acts as a roadblock to give Luffy some climbing room, and Zorro emerges from a snow bank cold, cranky, and ready to rumble
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Island Where Snow Lives! Climb the Drum Rockies!

programme.title: After a long journey up the mountain, Nami finally receives much-needed medical attention, but Sanji and Luffy are more interested in eating the doctor!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy recruits Tony Tony Chopper to join the Straw Hat crew as the ship’s doctor.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Outcast's Dream! Hiriluk the Quack!

programme.title: Chopper’s first friend was a quack doctor who couldn’t cure a cold, but the old man still managed to teach the little reindeer how to care for people.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Hiriluk's Cherry Blossoms and the Will that Gets Carried On!

programme.title: Luffy unleashes the full force of his Gum Gum furry on Wapol, and Chopper is amazed by the rubberman’s fierce devotion to the pirate flag.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fight Wapol's Crew! The Power of the Munch Munch Fruit!

programme.title: When Wapol orders his goons to attack the Straw Hats, Chopper shows off a little something he calls the Rumble Ball!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Zoan-type Devil Fruit! Chopper's Seven-form Transformation!

programme.title: Wapol attacks Nami in her weakened condition, but Monkey B. Luffy is quick to step in and even the odds.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: When the Kingdom's Rule Ends! The Flag of Faith Flies Forever!

programme.title: After an explosive battle with Wapol, Luffy begins the tiring process of convincing Chopper to join his pirate gang.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Hiriluk's Cherry Blossoms! Miracle in the Drum Rockies!

programme.title: Chopper sets sail for Alabasta with his new friends, and Dalton thinks back to his first meeting with Princess Vivi.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Goodbye Drum Island! I'm Going Out to Sea!

programme.title: The Straw Hats rescue a man of many faces as they approach Alabasta. Sure, he’s good for a laugh, but they may regret pulling him out of the drink.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Alabasta's Hero and a Ballerina on the Ship!

programme.title: The Straw Hats arrive in Alabasta with precious little time to stop the rebellion. Sanji and Chopper are sent to gather supplies for a dangerous trip across the desert.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Off to the Desert Kingdom! The Rain-Summoning Powder and the Rebel army!

programme.title: Captain Smoker has Luffy in his grasp until a fiery stranger creates a diversion, giving the Straw Hats a chance to make a break for it.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Heroes' Reunion! His Name is Fire Fist Ace!

programme.title: Ace and Luffy’s happy reunion is crudely interrupted by the Billions of Baroque Works. They may be outnumbered, but these brothers are no ordinary pirates!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Ace and Luffy! Hot Emotions and Brotherly Bonds!

programme.title: Before they can start their trek across the desert, Luffy and the Straw Hats are stopped at the shore by the cute – but formidable – Kung Fu Dugongs.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Erumalu, the City of Green and the Kung Fu Dugongs!

programme.title: Luffy’s crew encounters treacherous birds and man-eating foliage on its desert odyssey, and just when they think the coast is clear, a great disturbance emerges from beneath the sand!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Adventure in the Country of Sand! The Monsters that Live in the Scorching Land!

programme.title: The Straw Hats cross paths with the Barbar Sand Pirates, and Ace runs into big trouble when he gets separated from the group.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Enter the Desert Pirates! The Men Who Live Freely!

programme.title: Princess Vivi devises a plan to test the hearts of a gang of so-called rebels. They talk a good game, but will their bite measure up to their bark?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: False Fortitude! Camu, Rebel Soldier at Heart!

programme.title: The Straw Hats continue their journey to Yuba, where a bittersweet reunion with a childhood friend awaits Princess Vivi.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Rebel Warrior Koza! The Dream vowed to Vivi!

programme.title: Fire Fist Ace is hired by two young boys to hunt down and capture a lethal bounty hunter known only as the Scorpion.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Showdown in a Heat Haze! Ace vs. the Gallant Scorpion!

programme.title: Chopper, Zoro, and Luffy get separated from the others. When the heat makes Luffy act even stranger than usual, his friends wonder if they joined the right pirate gang.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Ruins and Lost Ways! Vivi, Her Friends and the Country's Form!

programme.title: The assassins of Baroque Works gather at Spider’s Café, and the Straw Hats arrive at Yuba only to find it buried in sand.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Spiders Caf? at 8 o'Clock! The Enemy Leaders Gather!

programme.title: Crocodile reveals himself to the Baroque Works assassins and discloses his dastardly plan for Alabasta. After departing Yuba, Luffy takes a stand that forces Vivi to rethink her mission.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy vs. Vivi! The Tearful Vow to Put Friends on the Line

programme.title: Vivi takes Luffy’s advice, and the Straw Hats head towards Rainbase for a confrontation with Crocodile. Karoo finally reaches the palace with Vivi’s warning for King Cobra.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Battlefront of Alabasta! Rainbase, the City of Dreams

programme.title: Luffy leads a daring – but foolish – raid on Crocodile’s casino. His poor planning lands him behind bars with Captain Smoker – and more importantly, leaves Vivi unprotected.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Trap of Certain Defeat! Storming Raindinners!

programme.title: While the Straw Hats are stuck in the clink, King Cobra addresses the starving people of Nanohana. Will his unbelievable revelation drive his subjects past the brink of rebellion?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Operation Utopia Commences! The Swell of Rebellion Stirs!

programme.title: A royal imposter has the rebel army hell-bent on bringing Cobra’s reign to a violent end. Meanwhile, Luffy and his mates find themselves in deep trouble and even deeper water.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Terrifying Banana Gators and Mr. Prince!

programme.title: Sanji shows up in the nick of time to make the crocs cough up the key to Luffy’s freedom, but the ravenous reptiles spit up something else instead.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Key to a Great Comeback Escape! The Wax-Wax Ball!

programme.title: Crocodile snatches Vivi off the back of a giant crab, but Luffy’s not having it. The rubber-man goes toe-to-toe with the sandman in a battle that will end in bloodshed.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Merciless Mortal Combat! Luffy vs Crocodile

programme.title: Crocodile puts Luffy down for a never-ending dirt nap, and the Straw Hats get a lift from a crabby ally in their race to stop the looming rebellion.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dash For a Miracle! Alabasta Animal Land

programme.title: Vivi arrives in Alubarna with just enough time to stop the rebellion, but the agents of Baroque Works lurk in every corner, waiting to sabotage her plans for peace.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Rebel Army vs. Royal Army! Showdown at Alubarna

programme.title: Sanji buys Vivi some time by mixing it up with a foe of many faces. Outside Alubarna’s walls, Chopper and Usopp tangle with Miss Merry Christmas and her slugging sidekick.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Alubarna Grieves! The Fierce Captain Karoo

programme.title: Usopp finally shows some courage by using a five-ton hammer to play whack-a-mole with Miss Merry Christmas. He may be bluffing, but the distraction lets Chopper zero in on the enemy’s weakness.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sworn on a Friend's Dream! The Battle of Molehill, Block 4

programme.title: Chopper’s Rumble Ball could be the difference between life and death in the mole ballgame. Elsewhere, Sanji has trouble kicking a pretty enemy, and Vivi proposes something unthinkable.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Big Opening Day Today! The Copy-Copy Montage

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: While trying to snag General Hatler's prize medallion, which contains a fifty-carat ruby, Lupin inadvertently reels in Hatler's biggest secret, his toupee! An enraged General Hatler orders Lupin and his gang to be killed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Upon returning to Japan, Goemon finds his master on the brink of death. Furthermore, Jinkuro, a fellow disciple, had stolen half of the scroll containing the Secret Arts of the Iga Ninja. Will Goemon be able to avenge his master?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are in a remote area pursing a mysterious treasure, when they save a woman being chased by hoodlums. The woman invites the two back to her sister's manor, which is full of beautiful women…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A mysterious woman who claims to be Fujiko's aunt, gives Lupin an ultimatum: Find Marshal Rommel's lost gold or die! First, Lupin must decipher the location of the gold, written in ancient hieroglyphs.
programme.sub-title: A Witch in the Fourth Dimension

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The great thief Nezumi-Kozou Jirokichi IV appears before Goemon and reveals that their ancestors competed in the first International Thieves Championship together, but were defeated by Lupin's grandfather, Arsène Lupin…
programme.sub-title: The Phantom Thief Rat Boy Appears

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The warden of an African prison is holding Fujiko captive. Lupin and his gang infiltrate the prison and attempt to break Fujiko out, but they become the target of the Iron Lizards, robotic devices developed to chase down fugitives!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Linda, a beautiful dancer, has stolen Jigen's heart and a vengeful Meyer has taken Fujiko hostage. Believing the women they love are in danger and unaware that Linda and Meyer are working together, Lupin and Jigen are set up to kill each other…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: According to legend, a stamp named the Cinderella Shadow is said to make its owner a princess. Lupin and his gang pull off the heist, but a girl name Alice who also wants the stamp tags along. Will the little girl get her royal wish?
programme.sub-title: Where did the Cinderella Stamp Go?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has sent a notice declaring he will steal all the cash from every bank in Paris. Detective Melon, the granddaughter of Inspector Garimard, is chosen to catch Lupin alongside Inspector Zenigata.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has many secret techniques up his sleeve, and one of them is his Levitation Technique. In order to get their hands on this technique, a crime syndicate plots a dirty trick, where a fake Lupin tortures a man known as X8 and frames the real Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Inspector Zenigata get kidnapped and the two are forcibly conscripted into the Foreign Legion in Morocco. Lupin and Inspector Zenigata make a run for it, but not before they're shackled together at the neck.
programme.sub-title: The Wind in Morocco is Hot

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Beautiful Swedish twins, Latica and Anita, are engaged in a battle to the death over the Viking treasure map concealed on their backs. In disguise, Lupin learns the map's secret, but the map possesses an additional secret.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A hit has been ordered on Lupin and Puma, a formidable hitman who specializes in long-range attacks, is on his trail! Lupin takes his chances with a close range, one-on-one showdown against Puma, but the plan seemingly backfires and Lupin is shot…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Orion's Crown has been stolen and is up for grabs at a black-market auction. Lupin has his eyes on both the crown and the auction money, but first he must outsmart the other parties vying for the crown, including Fujiko.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A two-thousand-year-old casket has been excavated. Inside the casket is Camilla, a beautiful woman in a near-death state, holding a golden statuette of the Virgin Mary. Lupin attempts to steal the golden statuette, but things don't go as planned…
programme.sub-title: Lupin Who Turned into a Vampire

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are attending a party in Africa, waiting for an opportunity to snatch a rare black pearl. However, their plan goes awry when a gang of gorillas crashes the party and steals the black pearl.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Massive riches have been hidden inside Tsukikage Castle. Lupin and his gang must decipher a code to find out the whereabouts of this great treasure. Wii Lupin be able to locate the treasure before his rivals do?
programme.sub-title: Uncover the Secret of Tsukikage Castle

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen head to Mongolia in search of Genghis Khan's treasures. Meanwhile, Goemon is visiting his ancestor's grave to pay his respects when he encounters Fujiko, who is in search of Yoshitsune Minamoto's buried treasure.
programme.sub-title: The Hidden Gold of Genghis Khan

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The ICPO chief promises to erase Fujiko's criminal record in exchange for her cooperation in arresting Lupin. Up against an ego-bruised Inspector Zenigata and a determined Fujiko, have Lupin's heisting days come to an end?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen sneak on board a ship smuggling diamonds. However, what they find on board are several thousand chickens! Lupin and his gang infiltrate the Hong Kong smuggling boss's lair where diamonds are being illicitly sold…
programme.sub-title: Diamonds Disappeared Under the Sky of Hong Kong

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal a suitcase containing Costa Rican diamonds, but the contents turns out to be Inspector Zenigata. The real diamonds are being shipped to Puerto Rico inside a missile and Lupin must find out the precise launch time to intercept it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Kaguya, a beautiful woman, separately asks Lupin, Jigen and Goemon to gather the tears of the Yeti, a mermaid's scale, and the liver of a dragon so she can make a secret potion.
programme.sub-title: Search for the Treasure of Princess Kaguya

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A wealthy shipping magnate and also a bachelor, Onabes' final voyage is nothing short of extravagant, with a ship full of beautiful women and fine art. Things go as planned when Lupin infiltrates the ship disguised as a woman…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is in Hong Kong for a vacation when he is asked to find a woman in return for helping him escape from Inspector Zenigata. Lupin discovers the pickpocket who stole his wallet is the daughter of the woman he is looking for…
programme.sub-title: Where are the Peking Man's Bones?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Sleeping Lion, a statue made of solid gold, is being transported to a museum by a specially armored, airtight car. Lupin steals the armored car together with the statue and nearly asphyxiated Inspector Zenigata inside.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin manages to steal crime boss Mulligan's precious jewels, only have them stolen from him by Fujiko! Mulligan, unaware that Fujiko has his jewels, hires a skilled gunman named Hangman to take them back from Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has been put on auction at the Wanted Club and Dr. Mad places the winning bid. Dr. Mad also purchases Fujiko and Jigen from the auctions. The three are abandoned on a deserted island with killer cyborgs.
programme.sub-title: Lupin is Available to the Highest Bidder

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has his eyes on the royal family's Imperial State Crown, but thanks to Scotland Yard's Inspector Dover, stealing it won't be easy.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin announces he's going to steal the betting takes at the Kentucky Derby, but the heist fails. However, it's all part of the plan. Lupin's main target is really the Metropolitan Bank's underground vault.
programme.sub-title: Lupin Laughs at the Alarm Bell

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: After several divorces and a couple of deceased husbands, Jacqueline has amassed a fortune and a collection of impressive jewels. In a twist of fate, Lupin and Jacqueline become close... Too close for Jigen and Goemon's comfort…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: An illicit auction selling smuggled treasures is taking place. Lupin targets the auction. In the process, Lupin discovers the auctioneer is Cornelia, the woman he once loved who died saving his life…
programme.sub-title: The Lupin I Loved, Part One

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is reunited with Cornelia, a woman who died by her father's hands to save Lupin's life. However, Cornelia's memories of Lupin have been erased. Her father is Dr. Zel, a Nazi who has succeeded in resurrecting corpses and controlling them.
programme.sub-title: The Lupin I Loved, Part Two

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko discovers that the Holy Scripture for Immortality is hidden within the jungles of Thailand. However, Emmanuelle Poirot, a cold-hearted beauty, is after them too.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Action)

programme.title: A Saga Viking
programme.desc: Um grupo de cruéis vikings vai à Grã-Bretanha com a intenção de saquear. Mas os seus planos mudam quando enfrentam uma tempestade que os deixa náufragos na costa escocesa. Encalhados, aventuram-se até chegar a Danelaw, o distante acampamento viking.

programme.title: Operação Zodíaco
programme.desc: Um homem procura o mundo para um conjunto de artefatos místicos - 12 cabeças de bronze dos animais do zodíaco chinês.

programme.title: Morte Por Encomenda
programme.desc: Detetive é contratado para encontrar uma stripper, mas tudo se complica quando quem ele questiona acaba morto.

programme.title: O Imperador
programme.desc: Após se tornar alvo de seu irmão mais velho, o herdeiro de um trono decide procurar a ajuda de sua irmã e de um cavaleiro desacreditado, Jacob (Nicolas Cage), que precisa enfrentar vários problemas pessoais. Juntos, eles buscam o apoio de Gallain (Hayden Christensen), um lendário cavaleiro conhecido como Fantasma Branco.

programme.title: Sobibor
programme.desc: O oficial soviético, Alexander Pechersky, organiza uma revolta e fuga em massa de prisioneiros do campo de extermínio de Sobibór, em outubro de 1943.

programme.title: A Espada De Deus - A Última Cruzada
programme.desc: Dois cavaleiros cristãos chegam a uma ilha remota com a intenção de converter os aldeões pagãos à sua religião. O primeiro busca conquistá-los com compreensão e humildade, enquanto o segundo confia na intimidação e na violência. À medida que a ruptura se forma, os aldeões devem decidir de que lado estão, e os homens, até onde estão dispostos a ir e quanto sangue será derramado.

programme.title: Uma Questão de Fé
programme.desc: Uma garota cristã influenciada pelas aulas do professor se afasta da fé, seu pai tenta fazer algo a respeito.

programme.title: O Destino de Grace
programme.desc: Após uma missão, uma enfermeira do exército retorna à fazenda da sua avó em uma comunidade Amish, em Ohio, onde encontra um romance inesperado e é envolvida em um misterioso assassinato.

programme.title: O Diário de Tati
programme.desc: A adolescente Tati conta, de forma divertida, todos os problemas de sua juventude ao seu diário. Desde ficar em recuperação em matemática até os esforços para conseguir fisgar Zeca, sua paixão atual.

programme.title: Hora de Recomeçar
programme.desc: Uma jovem problemática precisa decidir entre ter uma vida divertida e sem preocupações da cidade grande, ou uma vida rural sem frescuras e muito trabalho duro para descobrir quem ela realmente é.

programme.title: Os Dez Mandamentos
programme.desc: Moisés ouve a voz de Deus vinda de uma Acácia de Fogo, que o inspira a confrontar o faraó do Egito.

programme.title: Desenhos Animados do Velho Testamento - Moises
programme.desc: O rei do Egito é avisado da profecia de que Messias chegará. Para evitar que o inimigo sobreviva, ele ordena que matem todos os bebês do sexo masculino.

programme.title: Desenhos Animados do Velho Testamento - Eliseu
programme.desc: Elias está prestes a encerrar seu ministério como profeta em Israel. Eliseu que será seu sucessor, o acompanha em seus últimos passos.

programme.title: Dear Dumb Diary
programme.desc: Baseado na série de livros, de sucesso, ‘Querido Diário Otário’ de Jim Benton.

programme.title: Uma Questão de Fé
programme.desc: Uma garota cristã influenciada pelas aulas do professor se afasta da fé, seu pai tenta fazer algo a respeito.

programme.title: Trauma
programme.desc: Após sofrer um grave acidente de carro, April desperta sem lembrar do que aconteceu.

programme.title: Eu Sei Onde Você Mora
programme.desc: Um homem obcecado por limpeza, tem sonhos estranhos e guarda no inconsciente um mistério do passado.

programme.title: Eles Existem
programme.desc: Para cinco amigos, o final de semana em uma cabana pelos remotos bosques do Texas será uma aventura repleta de festas. Mas tudo muda quando o que parecia só diversão se torna um terror ao serem perseguidos pelo feroz e lendário Pé Grande.

programme.title: Fora de Alcance
programme.desc: Um empresário sem escrúpulos, contrata o jovem rastreador, Ben, para guiá-lo pelo árido deserto de Mojave.

programme.title: Satan's Slaves
programme.desc: Após a morte prematura de uma mãe, uma família passa a vivenciar uma série de eventos sobrenaturais.

programme.title: Eu Sei Onde Você Mora
programme.desc: Um homem obcecado por limpeza, tem sonhos estranhos e guarda no inconsciente um mistério do passado.

programme.title: Trauma
programme.desc: Após sofrer um grave acidente de carro, April desperta sem lembrar do que aconteceu.

programme.title: Eles Existem
programme.desc: Para cinco amigos, o final de semana em uma cabana pelos remotos bosques do Texas será uma aventura repleta de festas. Mas tudo muda quando o que parecia só diversão se torna um terror ao serem perseguidos pelo feroz e lendário Pé Grande.

programme.title: A Face do Mal
programme.desc: Ao lado dos pais e das duas irmãs, Evan Asher (Harrison Gilbertson) é um jovem tímido e pouco sociável que se muda para uma grande casa, cujo passado é marcado por uma família que perdeu todos os filhos. Aproveitando o baixo preço e sem problemas superstições, os Asher se mudam para o local. Lá, Evan aproveita o tempo livre para desenvolver uma amizade/namoro com a vizinha Sam (Liana Liberato). Curiosos, os dois vão explorar o passado sombrio do local e despertar forças nada amigáveis.

programme.title: Fora de Alcance
programme.desc: Um empresário sem escrúpulos, contrata o jovem rastreador, Ben, para guiá-lo pelo árido deserto de Mojave.

programme.title: Uma Foto Antes de Morrer
programme.desc: Um grupo de amigos está envolvido em uma colisão entre um veado e um veículo na Rússia rural. Em busca de ajuda, eles tropeçam em uma cabana, onde encontram uma foto retratando seu acidente.

programme.title: Ouija Exorcismo
programme.desc: Em 1985, um exorcista famoso prendeu um demônio horrível dentro de um tabuleiro Ouija. Pensando que o tabuleiro era um jogo, seu filho jogou sem obedecer às regras e soltou o demônio.

programme.title: Sem evidências
programme.desc: Dizem que os crimes foram satânicos. A verdade pode ser mais assustadora.

programme.title: Passagem Para a Vida
programme.desc: Um estranho chega a uma pequena cidade planejando roubar o banco, mas seus planos tomam um rumo improvável.

programme.title: Um Plano Brilhante
programme.desc: Na Londres dos anos 1960, um zelador idoso convence um executivo com restrições de teto de vidro a ajudá-lo a roubar um punhado de diamantes de seu empregador, a London Diamond Corporation.

programme.title: Xeque-Mate
programme.desc: Slevin Kelevra (Josh Hartnett) está com vários problemas em sua vida. O prédio onde mora foi condenado, sua carteira de identidade foi roubada e ele recentemente flagrou sua namorada na cama com outro homem. Para escapar ao menos por algum tempo dos problemas, ele consegue emprestado com seu amigo Nick Fisher (Sam Jaeger) um apartamento em Nova York. Paralelamente um plano está sendo tramado no submundo do crime de Nova York. Para se vingar da morte de seu filho, o Chefe (Morgan Freeman) planeja um golpe no filho de seu arquiinimigo, o Rabino (Ben Kingsley). O Chefe contrata Goodkat (Bruce Willis) para executar o plano, que consiste em encontrar um apostador que deva muito dinheiro ao Chefe a ponto de aceitar matar o filho do Rabino para se livrar da dívida. O escolhido é Nick Fisher, o que faz com que Goodkat vá até seu apartamento e confunda Slevin com seu alvo.

programme.title: Dupla em Fúria
programme.desc: O jovem detetive Wang Bu'er e seu amigo Huang Feihong embarcam em uma investigação cheia de emoção e eventos inesperados.

programme.title: Sangue Na Veia
programme.desc: Uma mulher se vê contra o submundo do crime quando seu marido desaparece durante a lua-de-mel. Decidida a recuperá-lo, ela enfrentará qualquer um que cruzar seu caminho.

programme.title: Sem evidências
programme.desc: Dizem que os crimes foram satânicos. A verdade pode ser mais assustadora.

programme.desc: Slevin Kelevra (Josh Hartnett) está com vários problemas em sua vida. O prédio onde mora foi condenado, sua carteira de identidade foi roubada e ele recentemente flagrou sua namorada na cama com outro homem. Para escapar ao menos por algum tempo dos problemas, ele consegue emprestado com seu amigo Nick Fisher (Sam Jaeger) um apartamento em Nova York. Paralelamente um plano está sendo tramado no submundo do crime de Nova York. Para se vingar da morte de seu filho, o Chefe (Morgan Freeman) planeja um golpe no filho de seu arquiinimigo, o Rabino (Ben Kingsley). O Chefe contrata Goodkat (Bruce Willis) para executar o plano, que consiste em encontrar um apostador que deva muito dinheiro ao Chefe a ponto de aceitar matar o filho do Rabino para se livrar da dívida. O escolhido é Nick Fisher, o que faz com que Goodkat vá até seu apartamento e confunda Slevin com seu alvo.

programme.title: O Relutante Fundamentalista
programme.desc: Um jovem paquistanês se vê em um conflito entre seu sonho americano, uma crise de reféns e sua terra natal.

programme.title: Stretch
programme.desc: Um motorista luta para pagar uma dívida. Ele assume um trabalho com um passageiro louco e perigoso.

programme.title: Muita Calma Nessa Hora
programme.desc: Três jovens amigas, Tita, Mari e Aninha, decidem mudar de situação e viajam para um local de praia para passar um fim de semana. Na estrada, eles conhecem Estrella, uma hippie que quer se esconder para tentar encontrar seu pai desconhecido.

programme.title: Albatroz
programme.desc: Beth, uma adolescente estudiosa, fica amiga de Emilia, uma aspirante a romancista recém-chegada à cidade. Emilia logo começa a ter um caso com o pai de Beth e isso pode ser a porta de entrada para consequências devastadoras.

programme.title: A Recompensa
programme.desc: Depois de passar 12 anos na prisão, um famoso ladrão está de volta para receber o que lhe é devido.

programme.title: Quem é Morto Sempre Aparece
programme.desc: Para resolver seus problemas financeiros, um agente de viagens está de olho em um cadáver congelado, que por acaso está sendo procurado por dois assassinos.

programme.title: Transpondo Barreiras
programme.desc: Após a morte da mãe de Vincent (com síndrome de Tourette) seu pai o interna numa clínica experimental.

programme.title: O livro
programme.desc: Um livro de auto-ajuda muda a vida de diferentes pessoas de Los Angeles. Quem é o escritor solitario?

programme.title: Muita Calma Nessa Hora
programme.desc: Três jovens amigas, Tita, Mari e Aninha, decidem mudar de situação e viajam para um local de praia para passar um fim de semana. Na estrada, eles conhecem Estrella, uma hippie que quer se esconder para tentar encontrar seu pai desconhecido.
